titles.title: SF392 O Holy Spirit, Lord of grace,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Holy Spirit, Lord of grace,
eternal fount of love,
inflame, we pray, our inmost hearts
with fire from heaven above.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As you unite in holy bond
the Father and the Son,
so fill us all with mutual love,
and make our hearts as one.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
All glory to the Father be,
the Spirit and the Son,
all glory to the One in Three,
while endless ages run.
